= `static` Class *jplex.xprototype.Logger*  =

== Description ==
Logger class. Is binded with firebug.





== Methods ==
<table border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5">                                
<tr><td> *Signature* </td><td> *Return Type* </td><td> *Description* </td></tr>
<tr><td> `error(e)` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Logs an error inside firebug<br />  - `e <String>` The message<br/></td></tr>
<tr><td> `log(e)` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Logs a message inside firebug<br />  - `e <String>` The message<br/></td></tr>
<tr><td> `warning(e)` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Logs a warning inside firebug<br />  - `e <String>` The message<br/></td></tr>
